item.description: Is software engineering the golden ticket to prosperity and fulfillment, or is it overrated in our hyper-digital age?

item.title: Create Your Blog with Hugo's Static Site Generator
item.description: Discover the simplicity of building your own website using Static Site Generators (SSGs) in this post. We’ll explore how SSGs streamline the process, making web development accessible to everyone.

item.title: Projects
item.description: This section outlines some of the projects I have taken on my quest to constantly learn and upskill. Logo Title Description TechMart An Ecommerce application with the ability to add and edit products on the go using Sanity CMS, advanced cart functionalities and a payments functionality with Stripe.
